parser

Interface PPDELParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicXMLPPDELParser

    public interface PPDELParser
    This interface represents a PPDEL input file parser.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isDocumentValid(java.lang.String documentPath)
      Checks if a document is valid.
      SimulationState parseDocument(java.lang.String documentPath)
      Parses a PPDEL input document.

    • Method Detail

      • isDocumentValid

        boolean isDocumentValid(java.lang.String documentPath)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if a document is valid.
        Parameters:
        documentPath - Path to the document.
        Returns:
        True if the document is valid, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the document cannot be accessed.

      • parseDocument

        SimulationState parseDocument(java.lang.String documentPath)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Parses a PPDEL input document.
        Parameters:
        documentPath - Path to the document.
        Returns:
        A SimulationState resultant of the parsed document.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the document is not valid.
        java.io.IOException - When the document cannot be accessed.
